body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

`temporal.api.enums.v1.schedule.ScheduleOverlapPolicy.SCHEDULE_OVERLAP_POLICY_UNSPECIFIED`

- If server stores UNSPECIFIED and later changes its default, the schedule I created earlier thinking it would be default/SKIP will now behave differently
- Would be nice if SDK never received `overlap_policy: UNSPECIFIED` from `DescribeSchedule`

**Describe the solution you'd like**

When server receives UNSPECIFIED schedule overlap policy on create or update, store it as whatever the current default is (atm SKIP).

**Additional context**

cc @dnr @bergundy @cretz
title: When receive UNSPECIFIED schedule overlap policy, store as SKIP
